Currently studying Applied Computer Science at the University for applied Science in Konstanz.

skills.text: A Summary of my different Skills and Knowledge base.

personal.text: Hello there! I am a Information Technology student at the University of applied Science in Konstanz. Before I started studying I finished a apprenticeship as a IT Specialist for Software and Application Development. Technology is a big part of my life and I am constantly searching for new ways to improve my skills or aquire new ones. I really enjoy mastering cutting edge technology and broadening my horizon. My Goal is to be a Full Stack Developer capable of working anywhere and solve problems effectively!
